home.title: SouthTropic
home.subtitle: Where visual stories meet world-class stays

about.paragraph1: My name is Axel, born and raised in Puerto Rico. I am a content creator with over 6 years of experience, specializing in collaborations with hotels and Airbnb properties. I take pride in working with some of the most prominent accommodations across Puerto Rico and across the globe.
about.paragraph2: My content philosophy is rooted in the art of storytelling, capturing the most striking imagery of each property to promote tourism and inspire travelers. I produce high-quality photography and videography that goes beyond showcasing spaces; I aim to humanize the unique experiences offered to both regional and international audiences. For me, this work transcends a typical job, it is my passion. I approach every project with unwavering dedication, and that commitment is consistently reflected in the final result.
